analysis.description:
CreationContract.create (/unique_chucks/4/0x2df43e6826cf24bb844cc78611b0036eea3671b4.sol#42-48) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.issueNewCoins(_destination,_amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x2df43e6826cf24bb844cc78611b0036eea3671b4.sol#45-48)

DestructionContract.destroy (/unique_chucks/4/0x2df43e6826cf24bb844cc78611b0036eea3671b4.sol#90-94) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.destroyOldCoins(msg.sender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x2df43e6826cf24bb844cc78611b0036eea3671b4.sol#93-94)
